projects.name: FastMCP Migration
projects.description: Migrate the VoidCat Reasoning Core from MCP to FastMCP architecture, streamlining the project by removing unnecessary files and improving code organization.

tasks.name: Create FastMCP Implementation
tasks.details:
Create a new fastmcp.py file that implements the FastMCP architecture using FastAPI. This should include:
1. Tool registration and execution
2. Integration with VoidCat engine
3. Async request handling
4. Built-in tools for notifications and reasoning

tasks.name: Create FastMCP Launch Script
tasks.details:
Create a launch_fastmcp.py script that properly initializes the environment and starts the FastMCP server. This should:
1. Set up the Python environment
2. Import the FastMCP implementation
3. Handle errors gracefully
4. Provide clear logging

tasks.name: Update API Gateway
tasks.details:
Update the API gateway to use FastMCP instead of the old MCP implementation. This should:
1. Import the FastMCP implementation
2. Use FastMCP for processing queries
3. Ensure all existing endpoints continue to work
4. Add any new endpoints needed for FastMCP

tasks.name: Identify and Remove Unnecessary Files
tasks.details:
Identify and remove unnecessary or outdated files to streamline the project. This should include:
1. Multiple MCP server implementations that are no longer needed
2. Duplicate debug files
3. Outdated launch scripts
4. Any other files that are no longer needed with FastMCP

tasks.name: Update Docker Configuration
tasks.details:
Update the Docker configuration to use FastMCP instead of the old MCP implementation. This should:
1. Update the Dockerfile to use FastMCP
2. Update docker-compose.yml if needed
3. Update any Docker launch scripts

tasks.name: Update Tests
tasks.details:
Update the tests to work with FastMCP instead of the old MCP implementation. This should:
1. Update existing tests to use FastMCP
2. Add new tests for FastMCP-specific functionality
3. Remove tests that are no longer relevant

tasks.name: Update Documentation
tasks.details:
Update the documentation to reflect the FastMCP architecture. This should:
1. Update README.md with FastMCP information
2. Update any other documentation files
3. Add FastMCP-specific documentation
